Uses of Interface
facades.ClientFacade

  • Packages that use ClientFacade 
    Package Description
    facades  
    singleton  

    • Uses of ClientFacade in facades

      Classes in facades that implement ClientFacade 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AdminFacade
      With the admin (administrator) facade - the layer for the business logic - the administrator can create, remove and perform various actions relating to companies & customers
      class  CompanyFacade
      With the company facade - the layer for the business logic - the company can create, remove and perform various actions relating to its details & coupons.
      class  CustomerFacade
      With the customer facade - the layer for the business logic - the customer can purchase coupon (and remove it) and get its coupons

    • Uses of ClientFacade in singleton

      Methods in singleton that return ClientFacade 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ClientFacade CouponSystem.Login(java.lang.String userName, java.lang.String password, ClientType type)
      Login to the system.
